title: What are the differences between QLED, OLED, and 4k LED TVs? - Quora

response.answer_text: LED stands for light-emitting diode - the lighting system used in the vast majority of LED/LCD TVs for years now. In QLED the Q, stands for Quantum Dot. OLED stands for organic light-emitting diode. 4K refers to resolution (pixels) of LED TV.
